text: Most people who played this game remember Momo's Tower. It comes early in the game but it's full of puzzles and challenging battles if you're not prepared. That's reason enough for me to have this theme forever stuck in my brain. Capcom has been doing very good lately, what wouldn't I give for a real BoF VI that isn't an insult to its fanbase.
author: SupraDarky

text: Amen. Such a cute/bizarre-o song until you get a fkn encounter and get whipped out. ; - ;   WHERE ARE YOU MOMO FFS
author: NimRook

text: Remember how she could train you in BoF4? That was supreme EXCITE
author: Robert Dant

text: This series always intrigued me with it's art, but I just hate how bland the gameplay is. It's pretty sad that Capcom overlooked any unique ideas they could have implemented in this series' battle systems. I want to love these kinds of games, but I'm totally a fake fan of the turn based battle systems found in most RPGs.
author: SuperDerpy

text:
i mean, i think the master system and dragon genes are both super unique mechanics

there's also Dragon Quarter, which is its own really weird thing entirely. its super niche, but i dont think anyone could argue that it wasnt inventive
